1.title: Institutional Management (Update)
1.subtitle: Full-Stack Refactoring and Optimization
1.description: Educational platform refactored with React and TypeScript, optimizing user experience and scalability.
demoDescription: Updated version of a management application for educational institutions.
Implements React and TypeScript for data integrity and Axios communication.
Allows creating users by role (admin, teacher, student) with adapted authentication.
Automatically initializes roles and basic data in the database.
Integrates external API for Colombian departments and municipalities.
Administrators can register institutions and manage teachers/students.
Designed to scale with future functionalities.

2.title: GymFlow App
2.subtitle: Full-Stack React + Django
2.description: Gym management app with React and Django. Includes Admin and User roles, member management, and responsive design.
demoDescription: Comprehensive gym management application with Admin and User roles.
Admin: complete member management, membership assignment, and user creation.
User: manages their profile and assigned members.
Dynamic React frontend and Django Rest Framework backend.
Focuses on data persistence and responsive design.

3.title: EduBase
3.subtitle: Final Full-Stack Project (MinTic)
3.description: Full-Stack academic platform developed with HTML5 and Tailwind. It allows efficient data management and serves as a foundation for future developments.
demoDescription: Academic platform developed as a final Full-Stack project in MinTic.
Allows registering institutions and creating users.
Frontend built with HTML5 and Tailwind, backend designed for efficient data consumption.
Provides a foundation to add future functionalities and scale the project.

4.title: TaskMaster
4.subtitle: Full-Stack with Django + MySQL
4.description: Productivity app to manage tasks in real time. Backend built with Django and MySQL, and a minimalist React frontend.

5.title: Hotel Alura Management
5.subtitle: Java 6 Backend with JDBC
5.description: Desktop software for managing reservations and guests. Java backend using JDBC for efficient database handling.
